global.siteTagline: Somali Centre For Agricultural Development & Resilience

hero.title: Building Resilience in Somali Agriculture
hero.description: Empowering farmers through sustainable development, innovative solutions, and knowledge creation

about.title: About SCADER
about.description1: SCADER is dedicated to transforming agriculture in Somalia through innovation, education, and sustainable practices. Our team of experts works tirelessly to build resilience in the agricultural sector, creating opportunities for economic growth and food security.
about.description2: Since our establishment, we have trained over 5,000 farmers, implemented sustainable farming techniques across 10,000 hectares of land, and developed innovative solutions to address the unique challenges faced by Somali agriculture.

services.title: Land Preparation
services.description: Professional land preparation services to optimize farming conditions and maximize crop yield.

services.title: Liquid Fertilizer
services.description: Advanced liquid fertilizer solutions to enhance soil fertility and promote healthy plant growth.

services.title: Plant Protection
services.description: Comprehensive plant protection services to safeguard crops from pests and diseases.

services.title: Modern Farming
services.description: Utilizing modern technology including drones for efficient agricultural operations.

services.title: Harvest Services
services.description: Professional harvesting services to ensure crops are collected efficiently and with minimal waste.

services.title: Training & Education
services.description: Technical training courses to build capacity and knowledge among local farmers.

whatWeDo.title: Resilient Policies
whatWeDo.description: Developing and implementing policies that strengthen agricultural resilience in the face of climate change and other challenges.

whatWeDo.title: Capacity Building
whatWeDo.description: Building the capacity of farmers and agricultural stakeholders through training, resources, and support systems.

whatWeDo.title: Technical Training
whatWeDo.description: Providing comprehensive technical training courses to enhance agricultural knowledge and skills.

whatWeDo.title: Creative Solutions
whatWeDo.description: Developing innovative approaches and solutions to address agricultural challenges in the Somali context.

missionVision.vision: To build human capital that promotes economic and agricultural development in Somalia, creating a sustainable future for all.
missionVision.mission: To be a leading research and development organization that creates a knowledge hub for the sustainable management of marginal resources.

newsletter.title: Stay Updated
newsletter.description: Subscribe to our newsletter for the latest news, updates, and insights from SCADER.
